prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with blue skin and glowing antennae.
I want an adorable aquatic creature that has a round body and bright yellow accents.
Generate a Pokemon that looks cute and has two long, wavy fins.
Make a tiny, electric-type Pokemon that shines in the dark with its lights.
Imagine a Pokemon that can swim gracefully and has a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon with big eyes that radiates cheerful energy and can be found in oceans.
Show me a Pokemon that uses electricity in battle and has a playful personality.
